{{Cleanup-laundry|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox Brewery | name = Appalachian Brewing Company | image = <!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:abc logo.gif|120px|Appalachian Brewing Company Logo]] --> | caption = Appalachian Brewing Company Logo | location = {{flagicon|USA}} {{flagicon|Pennsylvania}} [[Harrisburg, Pennsylvania|Harrisburg]], [[Pennsylvania]], [[United States|USA]] | owner = Appalachian Brewing Company | opened = 1997 | production = 15,000 [[Barrel (unit)|U.S. barrels]] | active_beers = {{brewbox beer|name=Water Gap Wheat|style=[[ale]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Purist Pale Ale|style=[[pale ale]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Mountain Lager|style=[[Lager]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Jolly Scot Scottish Ale|style=[[Scottish ale]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Hoppy Trails|style=[[India pale ale|IPA]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Susquehanna Stout|style=[[Stout]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=Broad Street Barley Wine|style=[[Barleywine|Barley Wine]]}} {{brewbox beer|name=|style=}} | seasonal_beers = | other_beers = }} The '''Appalachian Brewing Company''', commonly known as '''ABC''', is an [[United States|American]] [[brewery]] in [[Harrisburg, Pennsylvania]]. It was founded in January 1997. Appalachian also operates pubs in [[Camp Hill, Pennsylvania|Camp Hill]] and [[Gettysburg, Pennsylvania|Gettysburg]].
== Flagship Varieties == * '''Water Gap Wheat Ale [[Wheat Ale]]''' * '''Purist Pale Ale [[English Pale Ale]]''' * '''Mountain Lager [[Dortmund Export]]''' * '''Jolly Scot Scottish Ale [[Scottish Style Ale]]''' * '''Susquehanna Stout [[Stout]]''' * '''Trail Blaze Organic [[Brown Ale]]''' * '''Broad Street Barley Wine [[Barley Wine]]'''
The company produces a specialty beer each month.
